00030 function AutoLaunch ( $str )
00031 // User's manual :
00032 //Launch Web generation at the end of the page load
00033 //If DEBUG_MODE is set to true, the content of
00034 //$str will be displayed
00035 //
00036 // Contract :
00037 //
00038 {
00039         if ( class_exists ( 'CurrentPage' ) && is_subclass_of ( CurrentPage, 'AbstractSingleton' ) )
00040         {
00041                 CurrentPage::GetInstance();
00042                 $str = '[DEBUG='.$str.']';
00043         }
00044         
00045         if ( ! DEBUG_MODE )
00046         {
00047                 $str = '';
00048         }
00049         
00050         return $str;
00051 }
